actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to designate the Federal building located at the corner of North 29th Street and Fourth Avenue North in Billings, Montana, as the "William J. Jameson Federal Building", and for other purposes.

summary.text: Designates the Federal building located at the corner of North 29th Street and Fourth Avenue North in Billings, Montana, as the William J. Jameson Federal Building.

titles.title: A bill to designate the Federal building located at the corner of North 29th Street and Fourth Avenue North in Billings, Montana, as the "William J. Jameson Federal Building", and for other purposes.
